metadata.description: This December 1940 issue of the Philippines Magazine includes a brief profile of personalities such as Paul V. McNutt, Leo Kocialkowski, Harry B. Hawes, Francisco Varona, Pilar N. Ravelo, Joaquin M. Elizalde, and Maj Gen. James G. Harbord; message of President Manuel L. Quezon on the Philippine Commonwealth; speech on independence and economics by former finance minister Manuel Roxas.
metadata.subject: Magazine
metadata.title: Philippines Magazine Vol. 1 No. 1 (December 1940)
